divs: Sighting Detailsme and my husband and kids were traveling from n.c to c.a we were on the 40west in new mexico almost exiting in to arizona and we were geting out thefreeway to go to mcdonalds it was around 6 am and it was boring so iwas looking at the sky and it was a big silver ball at firts i that it was a plane because it was flaying really slow but then it looked like it was going down butit curved up fast and it shooted up fast and it disapierd less than 2 seconds iwas really scared me and my husband looked at eache other fast and i asked him if he seen what i seen and he said yes a was so scared i felt like my hart was going to stop. because i never seen a plane do that before so i no that it wasent a plane. no one belives me when i tell them what i seen because they are cristian and i dint ether before but now i do. but i know what i seen that morning and it wasent a plane.
